name: ADOSecurityScanner
description: Scan Azure DevOps components for security issues.
author: azsdktm

inputs.name: AzureDevOpsConnectionName
inputs.label: Azure DevOps Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure DevOps connection required to access resources

inputs.name: OrgName
inputs.label: Organization Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Org name for which scan needs to be performed.

inputs.name: ProjectNames
inputs.label: Project Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of projects against which Security Verification should be run.

inputs.name: BuildNames
inputs.label: Build Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of builds against which Security Verification should be run.

inputs.name: ReleaseNames
inputs.label: Release Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of releases against which Security Verification Tests (SVTs) should be run.

inputs.name: ServiceConnectionNames
inputs.label: Service Connection Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of service connections against which Security Verification Tests (SVTs) should be run.

inputs.name: AgentPoolNames
inputs.label: Agent Pool Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of agent pools against which Security Verification Tests (SVTs) should be run.
